name: Trained In The Jedi Arts
Lore: 'While Qui-Gon spent years maintaining peace, Maul was sharpening his combat skills. Those years of training came to fruition in one fateful moment.',
Text: 'Deploy on table. Your [Pemanent Weapon] and [Maintenance] cards are lost. ''Vader'' on your Interrupts may be treated as ''Maul or Mara Jade.''  Wherever you have an Effect with ''skill'' in its game text, your Force drains and battle destiny draws are +1. (Immune to Alter.)',
